imdb.plot outline: Former NASA chief scientist Waleed Abdalati explores the potential of citizen science and crowdsourcing in the digital age and the challenges facing them. Whether it's tracking air and water pollution at fracking sites or using apps to fight mosquito-borne diseases, everyday people can now be active participants in effecting change.
imdb.title: The Crowd and the Cloud
akas: The Crowd and the Cloud (United States)
plot: Former NASA chief scientist Waleed Abdalati explores the potential of citizen science and crowdsourcing in the digital age and the challenges facing them. Whether it's tracking air and water pollution at fracking sites or using apps to fight mosquito-borne diseases, everyday people can now be active participants in effecting change.
